sourcesContent:
const price_elasticity = (sales, product_price, slope)=>{
    const avgSales = avgSales => sales.reduce((a,b) => a + b, 0) / sales.length
    const avgProductPrice = avgProductPrice => product_price.reduce((a,b) => a + b, 0) / product_price.length
    console.log(avgSales)
    console.log(avgProductPrice)
    const perc_price_change = 1/avgProductPrice
    const perc_revenue_change = slope/avgSales
    const elasticity = perc_revenue_change/perc_price_change
    console.log(elasticity)
}

module.exports = price_elasticity; 
price_elasticity([1,2],[2,3],5)
